ArtistList.summary: Multiple artist objects with selected fields. NB: You must filter resources retrieved from this end-point with at least one of the following request parameters: name, like.

name.description:
The string that matches artist names you want a list of. NB: Values applied to this parameter may match more than one artist!
You should use the artist/read end-point to retrieve data for a particular artist.

like.description: Unique identifier string of the artist for which you want a list of similar artists.

genre.description: The genre you want an artists listing for.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not an artist image is included in the response.

image_size.description: Chooses the size of image included with each artist object if one is available.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

incl_also_liked.description: Decides whether or not a list of IDs for similar artists is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive artists that have been added/updated since the given timestamp (RFC3339).

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

order_by.description: Order events by the named object property.

ArtistRead.summary: An artist object with all fields.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Artist you want full details for

incl_images.description: Decides whether or not an artist images are included in the response.

incl_also_liked.description: Decides whether or not a list of IDs for similar artists is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

ArtistEvents.summary: A list of events for an artist.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Artist you want an events listing for.

incl_image.description: Decides whether or not an event image is included in the response.

image_size.description: Chooses the size of image included with each event object if one is available.

incl_stages.description: Decides whether or not a list of stages is included for any festival events in the response.

incl_artists.description: Decides whether or not a list of performing artists is included in the response.

incl_occurences.description: Decides whether or not a list of individual event occurrences is included for any repeat events in the response.

incl_tickets.description: Decides whether or not a list of available tickets is included in the response.

full_description.description: Decides whether full or summarised description text is included in the response.

updated_since.description: Only retrive events that have been added/updated since the given timestamp (RFC3339).

results_per_page.description: The number of results you want per page/chunk.

page.description: The page/chunk of results to be requested.

order_by.description: Order events by the named object property.

ArtistImage.summary: An artist image retrieved as either a JSON object or JPEG image.

id.description: Unique identifier string of the Artist you want an image for.

format.description: The format of the response you want back from the resource
